text: Ej ahli kitoʙ, (jahudiho) firistodai Mo (Muhammad sallallohu alajhi va sallam) dar davrone, ki pajomʙaron cand muddate firistodasuda naʙudand, maʙ'us sud, to haqro ʙar sumo oskor kunad va nagued, ki muƶdadihanda va ʙimdihandae ʙar mo firistoda nasudaast. Inak, on muƶdadihanda ʙa savoʙi dunjo va oxirat va ʙimdihanda az azoʙi dunjo va oxirat omadaast va Alloh ʙar har ciz tavonost va hamai cizho dar muqoʙili qudrati U taslim hastand
